response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product embodies innovation, efficiency, and unparalleled quality, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking excellence. Given its unique features and the value it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $8,000. Considering the investment and the benefits it provides, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposition carefully. If you have any questions or would like more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 9500}
